alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Middlesex; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 7:30PM EDT until June 05 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Middlesex, Western Monmouth and Eastern Monmouth. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 04/09 PM 7.8 2.1 1.2 Minor 05/09 AM 6.3 0.6 1.2 None 05/10 PM 7.6 1.9 1.0 Minor 06/10 AM 6.3 0.6 1.2 None 06/11 PM 7.3 1.6 0.8 Minor 07/11 AM 6.1 0.4 1.0 None Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 04/09 PM 7.2 2.0 1.1 Minor 05/09 AM 5.8 0.6 1.1 None 05/09 PM 6.9 1.7 1.0 Minor 06/10 AM 5.9 0.7 1.2 None 06/11 PM 6.9 1.7 1.0 Minor 07/11 AM 5.6 0.4 0.9 None Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 04/08 PM 6.1 1.7 0.7 Minor 05/09 AM 4.8 0.4 0.5 None 05/10 PM 6.0 1.6 0.6 Minor 06/10 AM 4.7 0.3 0.5 None 06/10 PM 5.8 1.4 0.5 Minor 07/11 AM 4.6 0.2 0.4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
